name: 8 Rotate - Gold Edition
description:
8 Rotate - Gold Edition!

Rotate circular image fragments to fix jumbled up pictures in this picture puzzle game.

Fragments can rotate to face 8 directions but only one will be the correct one!

Featuring:

  • 144 different picture puzzles to ponder
  • 12 different categories of pictures to play and unlock
  • 5 different difficulties from a very casual Beginner to a challenging Extreme
  • Adjustable colour theme
  • 5 Hints per level to help you when you get stuck, with more regenerating over time
  • Android and Windows versions

Play 8 Rotate - Gold Edition today!

How to Play

Click on picture circles to rotate them. Rotate all the circles to form the picture to win. You can click and hold, or right click, to lock a circle back into a square. Completing picture puzzles will unlock new categories of pictures.
